Class PokerClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • PokerClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, PokerConstant

    public class PokerClient
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.lang.Runnable, PokerConstant
    This class is a client side class for Poker Game which has a Poker Game GUI.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Rabi Thapa
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
